name: Macbat 64
description: Macbat 64 is a low poly 3D Platformer and 4:3 loveletter to the late 90s.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Pentium(R) Dual-Core CPU T4200 2.00GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3450 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card
